text:
Ranveer Singh Gatecrashes The Press Screening Of Simmba In Mumbai To Dance On 'Aankh Maare'!
Ranveer Singh Gatecrashes The Press Screening Of Simmba In Mumbai To Dance On 'Aankh Maare'!
If we ever make a list of all the things that Ranveer Singh does in a day, I am sure most of us know what all it would include. Apart from gushing over his wife Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh and his real-life antics are what is very popular.
Viral Bhayani
Enthu-cutlet Ranveer was in full-form during the promotions of his film Simmba and nothing much has changed even after the release.
Screengrab
Yesterday was a special screening of Simmba in Mumbai and Ranveer being Ranveer reached there! Apart from gatecrashing the screening, Singh also danced on 'Aankh Maare' while the audience cheered on and whistled!
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 544 SHARES 411 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
title: Ranveer Singh Gatecrashes The Press Screening Of Simmba In Mumbai To Dance On 'Aankh Maare'!
description: If we ever make a list of all the things that Ranveer Singh does in a day, I am sure most of us know what all it would include. Apart from gushing over his wife Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh and his real-life antics are what is very popular. Just another day in Ranveer's life.
